citations.title: **Months 1-3**: Work through [AGI Safety Fundamentals]( curriculum (~2-3 hours/week with readings)
Start with [Richard Ngo's AGI safety reading list](
Write explainers of AI safety papers for [Alignment Forum](
Check [Anthropic]( [OpenAI](https://openai.com/careers), or academic labs for volunteer opportunities
Check [Anthropic](https://www.anthropic.com/careers), [OpenAI]( or academic labs for volunteer opportunities
1. **Sign up for [AGI Safety Fundamentals]( (next cohort) or start self-study
2. **Join [AI Alignment Slack]( or [EleutherAI Discord](https://www.eleuther.ai/) to find collaborators
2. **Join [AI Alignment Slack](https://www.alignment.dev/)** or [EleutherAI Discord]( to find collaborators
3. **Read one key paper**: Start with [Concrete Problems in AI Safety]( (Amodei et al., 2016)
4. **Browse [Alignment Forum]( for 30 minutes to see what people are working on
